spec_data.Name: nodejs-raw-body
spec_data.Description:
This module gets the entire buffer of a stream either as a buffer or a string.
It validates the stream's length against an expected length and maximum limit.
It is ideal for parsing request bodies.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 03:54:19 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Get and validate the raw body of a readable stream
